Html:
Hello, we are developing and testing a windows forms app, and we have included your module on it.

For some unknown reason, and not always, mostly in a random way... the users are getting this error message:

Exception of type 'System.OutOfMemoryException' was thrown. at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.Initialize(Int32 capacity) at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2..ctor(Int32 capacity, IEqualityComparer`1 comparer) at GMap.NET.PureProjection..ctor() at GMap.NET.GMaps.AdjustProjection(MapType type, PureProjection& Projection, Int32& maxZoom) at GMap.NET.Internals.Core.set_MapType(MapType value) at GMap.NET.Internals.Core..ctor() at GMap.NET.WindowsForms.GMapControl..ctor() at StrikingSystems.Controls.Viewers.GMapViewer.InitializeComponent() at StrikingSystems.Controls.Viewers.GMapViewer..ctor() at UI.UIPanels.GenericControls.Media.MultimediaViewerControl.InitializeComponent() at UI.UIPanels.GenericControls.Media.MultimediaViewerControl..ctor() at ....

Is this error already notified?

Do you have a reported solution?

regards,

Ariel Garmendia

1. you use old version

2. i don't support old versions ;}

Hi,

it means its an already notified bug? and that upgrading it will be removed?

thanks

Ariel
